CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains about Warm-up task to MOT and leaves the room
MOT stands in front of table with CHI on her arm
CHI looks at and points to door
MOT puts CHI down on floor in front of toys
<aft> MOT picks up book and holds it so CHI can see pictures
MOT looks at book then at CHI
CHI starts to crawl away from MOT
MOT moves book so pictures face CHI
<bef> CHI sits down . CHI puts hand on lid
CHI first plays with lid then plays with crank
MOT stops turning crank and tilts box towards CHI
CHI puts hand on lid and pulls box closer
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box then at door
MOT looks at CHI and nods head yes
CHI looks down at jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI looks at football
MOT leans forward and puts hand on crank
MOT lifts ball up then puts it back on floor
CHI picks up ball and sits down
<bef> MOT puts book on little chair behind her
MOT reaches out for ball . <aft> MOT moves jack+in+the+box out of the way and holds hand out towards ball with palms up
CHI looks at MOT then at ball
<bef> MOT holds hands out towards ball . MOT takes ball
CHI leans forward and gives ball to MOT
CHI holds hands out towards ball
CHI looks down to her right
CHI looks around to her left then looks up at MOT . <aft> CHI looks at ball
MOT reaches hand out towards ball
MOT takes ball . <aft> MOT holds ball out in front of CHI
MOT looks at ball then at CHI
CHI looks down to her right
<aft> CHI gets down on hands and knees and crawls towards table
MOT pulls hand holding ball back
MOT leans forward and picks up a toy
MOT puts object on little chair
MOT looks at CHI and nods head yes
CHI looks up into camera . <aft> CHI turns and crawls toward MOT
<bef> MOT looks into camera . MOT looks at CHI
CHI starts to crawl towards jack+in+the+box
CHI puts ball on floor and puts hand on crank . <aft> CHI pulls jack+in+the+box closer
MOT helps CHI push the last few inches
MOT looks at CHI and nods head yes and smiles
MOT pulls jack+in+the+box closer . <aft> MOT turns crank
<bef> CHI pulls jack+in+the+box closer and tries to turn crank . <aft> CHI pushes jack+in+the+box over to MOT
<bef> CHI looks at jack+in+the+box then at MOT . <aft> CHI looks at jack+in+the+box
<bef> MOT watches CHI . MOT looks at jack+in+the+box
music is heard and all of a sudden clown pops up
CHI reaches out for clown then straightens up
CHI grabs head of clown and moves box closer . <aft> CHI plays with clown
MOT looks at and points to clown
CHI pushes clown down in box
MOT helps CHI push clown down in box and starts to push lid down
when CHI lets go of clown it pops up again
MOT pushes clown back in box and pushes lid down and then lets go of it
MOT pushes clown back in box
MOT holds top down with hand and turns crank once
CHI looks at MOT then at jack+in+the+box
CHI turns jack+in+the+box over with hand
CHI puts both hands on lid and then puts one hand on crank
CHI sits down and pulls jack+in+the+box closer
CHI starts to play with crank . <aft> CHI makes crank turn once
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
MOT nods head yes . MOT looks at jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT turns crank a couple of times
CHI grabs crank and turns it
CHI looks at something under table
a little bit of music is heard
<bef> MOT looks at CHI . MOT looks at jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI gets down on hands and knees and crawls towards table
CHI sits down next to table facing MOT
CHI looks at something under table
<bef> MOT looks at duck . MOT looks at CHI
CHI sits down . <aft> CHI squeezes duck which she holds out in front of her
CHI looks at MOT then at duck
MOT takes duck . <aft> MOT holds duck up in front of her and squeezes it
CHI leans forward towards jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI pulls crank
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
CHI sits down and pulls jack+in+the+box closer
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box and puts duck on floor
MOT puts jack+in+the+box down on floor . <aft> MOT turns crank
CHI reaches out for jack+in+the+box and pulls it closer . <aft> CHI tries to turn crank
CHI looks around in room then at crank
CHI reaches out for crank . <aft> CHI turns torso around to her right
CHI looks at crank . <aft> CHI looks at table then at MOT
MOT holds arms out then claps
<bef> CHI leans back . CHI reaches out for clown . <aft> CHI turns towards door
INV explains about Small Scale Activity to MOT and puts out toys on table
CHI is put in high chair and starts playing with toys
INV has MOT sit on chair and fill out forms and leaves room
INV explains about Forbidden Object task to MOT

INV sits down at table across from CHI and takes away all toys except necklace . MOT sits down on floor next to CHI who cries when the toys are taken away from her but stops when she sees forbidden object
INV places forbidden object on table
CHI reaches out for object but freezes her hand before it reaches balls
<bef> CHI moves hand closer to object
MOT puts hand on CHI's arm
<bef> CHI moves arm to her left to get rid of MOT's arm and then reaches out for object again
MOT puts CHI's hand down on table and holds it in her hand
CHI pulls hand away and reaches out for object again
MOT grabs CHI's hand and puts it on table
MOT looks at hand then at object
<bef> CHI pulls hand away . CHI leans head on MOT's arm
CHI bangs hand on MOT's arm
INV explains about PCI boxes to MOT and leaves
MOT is sitting on floor facing camera with CHI on her arm
MOT reaches out for box . <aft> MOT picks up box and drops it on the floor
MOT places CHI on floor in front of box
MOT reaches into box . <aft> MOT takes ball out of box and gives it to CHI
CHI reaches out for box and pulls it closer
CHI drops ball and reaches out for something
MOT holds hands out with palms up
CHI picks ball up . <aft> CHI pushes ball towards MOT
ball stops at end of MOT's foot
MOT reaches out for ball and pushes it towards herself
pitch gets higher and higher . <5-6> sing song voice
CHI puts hand on ball . <aft> CHI gives ball a push towards MOT
<5> MOT gives ball a little push towards herself
MOT catches ball . <aft> MOT rolls ball to CHI
MOT looks at CHI then at ball
CHI gives ball a little push towards MOT
MOT misses ball on first try
<bef> CHI picks up ball . CHI moves ball to her face then lowers it
CHI continues to move ball up and down
MOT holds arms out wide apart
MOT reaches out for ball and rolls it towards herself then rolls it to CHI
CHI puts hand on ball and gives it a push
MOT reaches out for ball and rolls it towards herself then to CHI
it sounds as it CHI has put mouth on ball
<aft> CHI lets herself fall towards MOT's leg turning around so her side is leaning against MOT's leg
MOT picks up ball and rolls it around on CHI's stomach
MOT puts ball on floor next to CHI's head
CHI looks at and points to something in the direction of the table . <aft> CHI looks up at boxes
CHI puts hands on ball then pulls them away
MOT picks up ball . <aft> MOT throws ball in box which she picks up and then crawls to desk on her knees and puts box with ball on top of it
CHI looks and points in the direction of MOT
CHI follows box with eyes . <aft> CHI looks at towel
MOT puts box on floor . <aft> MOT opens box
MOT looks at box . <aft> MOT looks at towel
MOT holds towel up in front of herself so she is hidden behind it
CHI looks at MOT then at box and lid
MOT holds towel up in front of her so it covers all of her . <aft> MOT lowers towel until rim reaches her nose
MOT looks at towel . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks at boxes then at MOT
MOT holds towel up in front of CHI
CHI crawls over box and lid
CHI reaches out for box . <aft> CHI lifts up both box and lid in one hand
MOT leans forward and grabs box and lid
MOT puts box and lid on desk
CHI follows box and lid with eyes
MOT picks up towel and holds it up in front of CHI . <aft> MOT puts towel over CHI's head
MOT leans forward towards CHI and tilts head
CHI gets down on hands and knees and crawls towards table
<aft> MOT holds towel up in front of her so it covers her torso
<bef> MOT holds towel up so it covers her face and then lowers it quickly
MOT holds towel up so it covers her torso
CHI glances over her shoulder at MOT
CHI picks up the object MOT put on chair
<bef> MOT holds towel up in front of her then lowers it quickly
CHI moves towards bag next to chair and starts playing with it
<bef> CHI moves back to chair . CHI turns around
MOT gets up on her knees then reaches for another box on the desk
CHI looks in the direction of desk
MOT puts paper on floor . <aft> MOT starts drawing
MOT looks at paper . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI gets down on hands and knees and lets object in her hand fall to the ground . <aft> CHI crawls towards crayon
CHI takes crayon . <aft> CHI crawls towards paper and sits down next to it
CHI picks up paper and holds it up in front of her
CHI looks at paper . <aft> CHI looks at MOT then at paper and lets it fall to the ground
MOT looks at and points to something on paper
MOT turns around and bends over paper
MOT looks at paper then at crayon
MOT picks up crayon . <aft> MOT starts to draw
CHI takes MOT's crayon and holds it out in front of her
MOT takes crayon . <aft> MOT starts drawing
CHI straightens up then pulls paper away from MOT and puts it down on the floor
CHI holds crayon out to MOT
MOT takes crayon . <aft> MOT starts drawing
MOT pulls crayon out of CHI's mouth
MOT leans forward and reaches out for crayon then pulls it out of CHI's mouth
CHI looks at MOT with the crayon in her mouth
MOT taps paper with hand and rearranges it
MOT picks up crayon . <aft> MOT puts a piece of paper on top of another one and starts drawing
CHI takes MOT's crayon . <aft> CHI puts crayon in mouth
MOT takes crayon out of CHI's mouth and wipes CHI's mouth
CHI moves crayon up to her mouth
MOT pulls crayon away from CHI's mouth
MOT takes crayon away from CHI
MOT lies down on floor in front of paper . <aft> MOT pulls another crayon out of CHI's mouth
MOT puts two crayons together and starts to draw with them
CHI straightens up . <aft> CHI leans forward . CHI starts drawing
MOT is trying to take crayon out of CHI's mouth but CHI will not let go of it
MOT pulls hand back a little
<$=2> MOT tries to pull crayon out of CHI's mouth
CHI takes crayon out of mouth
MOT straightens up and reaches out for crayon . <aft> MOT takes crayon away from CHI
CHI leans forward and takes MOT's crayon and then straightens up and puts crayon in her mouth
MOT tries to take crayon from CHI
MOT takes crayon out of CHI's mouth and picks up crayon on paper
MOT stands up on her knees and puts crayons and paper away
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
<bef> CHI gets down on hands and knees . CHI crawls towards door stop
MOT gets book out of its box and crawls on knees towards middle of room
MOT holds book so CHI can see it
<bef> CHI looks around the room . CHI crawls towards an object on the floor
MOT looks at and points to picture on page
CHI turns head and looks at item
CHI crawls closer to book and puts hand on page
MOT points to picture on page . <7 .> MOT looks at CHI
MOT points to and looks at picture on page
MOT looks at and points to picture on page . <4> MOT looks at CHI
MOT looks at and points to item
CHI covers her eyes with her hands
MOT looks at CHI briefly while nodding head yes
CHI points to something on page
CHI pulls book away from MOT and holds it up in front of herself
MOT looks at and points to a picture on page
MOT takes book from CHI . <aft> MOT turns a few pages
MOT looks at and points to something on page
CHI gets down on hands and knees
MOT holds book out in front of CHI
MOT looks at and points to picture on page
MOT looks at book then at CHI
CHI starts to get up supporting herself on MOT's leg
CHI tries to get into MOT's lap
<bef> MOT puts arm around CHI . MOT lifts CHI up so CHI is sitting on her arm
CHI puts hand on opposite page
MOT looks at item on page
CHI looks at item on page
CHI looks at the back side of book
INV makes a comment from the observation room which is audible on tape and makes it difficult to make out the last words of MOT utterance
MOT looks at and points to items on page
MOT looks at and points to something else on page
CHI slides out of MOT's lap and sits down on knees then drops book on floor
CHI puts hands and knees on floor
MOT picks up book . <aft> MOT holds book up in front of CHI
CHI leans forward and takes book . <aft> CHI puts book in MOT's lap and moves closer to MOT
CHI puts both arms in MOT's lap
MOT opens book and holds it up in front of CHI
CHI points to something and lets finger slide off page quickly
CHI pushes side of book as if to close it
CHI closes book then leans forward into MOT's lap
MOT kisses CHI and rubs CHI's back
CHI leans head on MOT's shoulder
MOT rocks back and forth a little
MOT lifts up CHI and places CHI in her lap
